fields.headline: Tech Weekly podcast
fields.bodyText: It's podcast'o'clock! This week, we focus on the politics of Google in an interview with Peter Greenberger, the head of the search giant's new Washington ad office. Charles Arthur reviews the Asus Eee PC with the help of his offspring, and we hear an elevator pitch from Web 2.0 property site Nestoria. You can stream the show, subscribe via iTunes or pick up the feed on our audio home page. And there's always our Facebook group too, if you're into that sort of thing.
